item.description:
We will have the entire club to ourselves, our group and several other meet up groups from 7 pm until the DJ starts up at about 9:30. Stay to dance after.
The group who sponsored this event in February had a great turnout, and several singles who showed met someone special, and have been dating ever since!! (Congratulations!!)
$10. cover includes free food (their pizza is great!) and admission to club for the evening. Bring a friend of the opposite sex who is single and "looking" and pay just $8 each.
Profits will benefit Motivating Miles foundation, participate in 50/50 raffle and win $$$$
This will be a fun event, if you are single and "looking" here is a great way to meet someone in a party atmosphere without any pressure.
item.name: Singles Mix and Mingle at the Junkyard (formerly Sky Lounge) in Nashua
